    • getCashaccountForeignExChangeRateByIdTenant

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<HoldCashaccountDepositJpaRepository.CashaccountForeignExChangeRate> getCashaccountForeignExChangeRateByIdTenant(Integer idTenant)
      Retrieves foreign exchange rates for all cash‐account deposit and withdrawal transactions belonging to the specified tenant.

      Combines rates for:

      • Transactions in portfolios where cash‐account currency ≠ portfolio currency
      • Transactions where cash‐account currency ≠ tenant base currency
      Each entry includes the transaction date, source currency, target currency, and closing rate.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID whose cash‐account FX rates are fetched
      Returns:
      a list of CashaccountForeignExChangeRate projections

    • getCashaccountForeignExChangeRate

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<HoldCashaccountDepositJpaRepository.CashaccountForeignExChangeRate> getCashaccountForeignExChangeRate()
      Retrieves distinct foreign exchange rates for all cash‐account deposit and withdrawal transactions across all tenants and accounts.

      Filters for transactions of type WITHDRAWAL or DEPOSIT (transaction_type ≤ 1), and uses hold_cashaccount_deposit timing to align with historyquote records.

      Returns:
      a list of CashaccountForeignExChangeRate projections

    • getLastBeforeDateByCashaccount

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) HoldCashaccountDeposit getLastBeforeDateByCashaccount(Integer idSecuritycashAccount, LocalDate date)
      Finds the most recent cash‐account deposit record before the given date.

      Selects the hold_cashaccount_deposit entry with the largest from_hold_date that is strictly less than the specified date for the given account.

      Parameters:
      idSecuritycashAccount - the cash‐account ID
      date - the cutoff date (exclusive)
      Returns:
      the HoldCashaccountDeposit record immediately preceding the date

    • getPrevHoldingRecords

      @Query(nativeQuery=true) List<HoldCashaccountDeposit> getPrevHoldingRecords()
      Retrieves the previous deposit-hold record for each cash account relative to its next deposit or withdrawal transaction.

      For every cash account, finds the hold_cashaccount_deposit entry whose from_hold_date is the greatest date before the next transaction date (t.tt_date). Returns one record per account.

      Returns:
      a list of HoldCashaccountDeposit entities representing the prior hold period
